00022 // the constructor
00023 Generator::Generator(QDomNode &generatorNode): hidden_(false),
00024 name_(), displayName_(), description_(),
00025 phase_(-1), parameters_(), apiType_(Generator::NONE), generatorExe_() {
00026 
00027         // get attributes for the componentGenerator
00028         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = generatorNode.attributes();
00029         QString hidden = attributeMap.namedItem(QString("spirit:hidden")).
00030                         childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00031         hidden_ = General::str2Bool(hidden, false);
00032 
00033         // go through all the child nodes of the component generator
00034         for (int i = 0; i < generatorNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00035                 QDomNode tempNode = generatorNode.childNodes().at(i);
00036 
00037                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:name")) {
00038                         name_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00039                 }
00040 
00041                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:displayName")) {
00042                         displayName_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00043                 }
00044 
00045                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:phase")) {
00046                         phase_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue().toDouble();
00047                 }
00048 
00049                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:parameters")) {
00050 
00051                         // go through all parameters
00052                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00053                                 QDomNode parameterNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00054                                 parameters_.append(QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00055                                                 new Parameter(parameterNode)));
00056                         }
00057                 }
00058 
00059                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:apiType")) {
00060                         if (tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue() == QString("TGI")) {
00061                                 apiType_ = Generator::TGI;
00062                         }
00063                         else {
00064                                 apiType_ = Generator::NONE;
00065                         }
00066                 }
00067 
00068                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:generatorExe")) {
00069                         generatorExe_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00070                 }
00071 
00072                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:description")) {
00073                         description_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00074                 }
00075         }
00076 
00077         // if mandatory fields are missing
00078 
00079         if (name_.isNull() ) {
00080                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element name missing in "
00081                                 " generator"));
00082         }
00083 
00084         if (generatorExe_.isNull()) {
00085                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:generatorExe "
00086                                 "missing in generator"));
00087         }
00088         return;
00089 }
00090 
00091 Generator::Generator( const Generator &other ):
00092 hidden_(other.hidden_),
00093 name_(other.name_),
00094 displayName_(other.displayName_),
00095 description_(other.description_),
00096 phase_(other.phase_),
00097 parameters_(),
00098 apiType_(other.apiType_),
00099 generatorExe_(other.generatorExe_) {
00100 
00101         foreach (QSharedPointer<Parameter> param, other.parameters_) {
00102                 if (param) {
00103                         QSharedPointer<Parameter> copy = QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00104                                 new Parameter(*param.data()));
00105                         parameters_.append(copy);
00106                 }
00107         }
00108 }

00110 Generator & Generator::operator=( const Generator &other ) {
00111         if (this != &other) {
00112                 hidden_ = other.hidden_;
00113                 name_ = other.name_;
00114                 displayName_ = other.displayName_;
00115                 description_ = other.description_;
00116                 phase_ = other.phase_;
00117                 apiType_ = other.apiType_;
00118                 generatorExe_ = other.generatorExe_;
00119 
00120                 parameters_.clear();
00121                 foreach (QSharedPointer<Parameter> param, other.parameters_) {
00122                         if (param) {
00123                                 QSharedPointer<Parameter> copy = QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00124                                         new Parameter(*param.data()));
00125                                 parameters_.append(copy);
00126                         }
00127                 }
00128         }
00129         return *this;
00130 }

00132 // the destructor
00133 Generator::~Generator() {
00134         parameters_.clear();

00137 void Generator::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00138         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:generator");
00139         writer.writeAttribute("spirit:hidden", General::bool2Str(hidden_));
00140 
00141         // if mandatory name is missing
00142         if (name_.isEmpty()) {
00143                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory name missing in spirit:"
00144                                 "generator"));
00145         }
00146         else {
00147                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:name", name_);
00148         }
00149 
00150         if (!displayName_.isEmpty()) {
00151                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:displayName", displayName_);
00152         }
00153 
00154         if (!description_.isEmpty()) {
00155                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:description", description_);
00156         }
00157 
00158         if (phase_ >= 0) {
00159                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:phase", QString::number(phase_));
00160         }
00161 
00162         // if any parameters exist
00163         if (parameters_.size() != 0) {
00164                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:parameters");
00165 
00166                 // write each parameter
00167                 for (int i = 0; i < parameters_.size(); ++i) {
00168                         parameters_.at(i)->write(writer);
00169                 }
00170 
00171                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:parameters
00172         }
00173 
00174         // write the spirit:apiType element
00175         switch (apiType_) {
00176         case Generator::TGI: {
00177                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:apiType", "TGI");
00178                 break;
00179         }
00180         // Generator::NONE
00181         default: {
00182                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:apiType", "none");
00183         }
00184         }
00185 
00186         // if mandatory generatorExe is missing
00187         if (generatorExe_.isEmpty()) {
00188                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory generatorExe is missing in "
00189                                 "spirit:generator"));
00190         }
00191         else {
00192                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:generatorExe", generatorExe_);
00193         }
00194 
00195         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:generator
00196 }
